column5: Hey Guys and Gals just idea i think would help out the Classified section and limit the unnecessary post of "Where are you located" or " How much"  and "How can i reach you"  I think it would be great with helping the Bandwidth and make it user friendly.
Definitely where the item is being sold, the price is already part of the rules and to contact the seller, just click on your avatar name and send them a PM

i think Classifeds should all be through PM let the seller post and thats it ! than its between the seller and potential buyer instead of someone complaining that its to expensive or they saw it online for 50 cents cheaper that kind stuff
Pay attention! We're talking business here.  JF
they should have a page what you have to fill out to sell something and if you dont fill in the boxes you cant post it such as  price: item: location: details: etc.
I think its free, so its awesome the way it is.
